sweepers.description: HAAGA 477 SWEEPER sweep twice with one move. The two front brushes rotate in opposite directions grabbing the big debris directly in front of the sweeper while the brush roller on the bottom picks up all the small particles.
sweepers.designed: Indoor / outdoor wide area surface cleaning of warehouse and factory flooring, parking lot and sidewalk surfaces, asphalt, concrete and all natural stone hard surfaces.

characteristics.description: 4 yr warranty on all brushes against wear

sweepers.description: HAAGA 497 SWEEPER is used by hotels, motels, government, maintenance departments, recreational facilities, movie theaters and services stations all over the world, Since 1969
sweepers.designed: Indoor / outdoor wide area surface cleaning of warehouse and factory flooring, parking lot and sidewalk surfaces, asphalt, concrete and all natural stone hard surfaces.

characteristics.description: 4 yr warranty on all brushes against wear

sweepers.description: HAAGA 677 SWEEPER easily sweeps fine dust, course dirt, sand, leaves, sticks, bottles, broken glass, wrappers, food, anything that can fit thru a 10 X 4 opening big or small debris.
sweepers.designed: Indoor / outdoor wide area surface cleaning of warehouse and factory flooring, parking lot and sidewalk surfaces, asphalt, concrete and all natural stone hard surfaces.

characteristics.description: 4 yr warranty on all brushes against wear

sweepers.description: HAAGA 697 SWEEPER is ideal for detail cleaning on indoors surfaces because the battery power allows for up close cleaning in and around equipment and work areas.
sweepers.designed: Indoor / outdoor wide area surface cleaning of warehouse and factory flooring, parking lot and sidewalk surfaces, asphalt, concrete and all natural stone hard surfaces.

floorwash.description: The Floorwash 1400B battery with rechargeable lithium-ion technology guarantees 1 hour of continuous use 5400 sq. ft. of cleaning with the option of interchanging the battery for continued use.
floorwash.designed: cleans grouted tile, concrete, marble, profiled ceramics, vinyl, rubberized, wood floors inside and outside. The Floorwash 1400B is Ideal for restaurants, hotels, bars, schools, offices, shops, convenience stores, medical centers as well as home use.

floor_dryer.description: Used all over the world in hotels, restaurants, government buildings, anywhere there is a slip and fall hazard.

scrubbers.description: Constructed from high-quality materials, the Floorwash 5000 is built to withstand heavy use in commercial and industrial settings, ensuring long-lasting performance and reliability.
scrubbers.designed: The Namco Floorwash 5000 Multi-Surface Floor Scrubber is designed to clean both hard floor surfaces and carpets with a single pass, making it an efficient and versatile cleaning solution for any environment.

scrubbers.description: The Namco Floorwash 1000 Multi-Surface Floor Scrubber can effectively clean up to 2,150 square feet per hour, making it an ideal choice for large commercial or industrial environments.
scrubbers.designed: The Namco Floorwash 1000 Multi-Surface Floor Scrubber is designed to clean both hard floor surfaces and carpets with a single pass, making it an efficient and versatile cleaning solution for any environment.
